title: Drawing, "Rainbow in the Spray, rou", July 1856
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on olive-green paper.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite ?: rock;and again, at top right: Bit of stairway at Niagara /  [the date]
description: Vertical view of a rock, at left, with a staircase which ends at its bottom and is continued by a road; the river bed is visible at right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Rainbow in the Spray, rou", July 1856.
July 1856. Graphite, brush and white gouache on olive-green paper.. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-34-b.
